bug.author: ogvalt
bug.summary: Recursive creation of link to run folder in itself
bug.description:
wandb --version && python --version && uname
Weights and Biases version: 0.8.20 Python version: 3.7 Operating System: Ubuntu Linux 19.10
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
I'm using catalyst integration of wandb. When program stores info on disk it creates inside itself link to itself like : <denchmark-code>| run123/ |----run123/ |----other files </denchmark-code>
In the result it fails to exit application normally and sent ERROR Error uploading... <denchmark-h:h3>What I Did</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>The only way to fix this is to remove link to folder, but why it is created at first place </denchmark-code>
